select sample.STABLE_ID as sampleId, mutation_event.REFERENCE_ALLELE as referenceAllele, mutation_event.TUMOR_SEQ_ALLELE as tumorAllele, count(*) as count from sample,mutation_event,mutation,genetic_profile where mutation_event.MUTATION_EVENT_ID=mutation.MUTATION_EVENT_ID and mutation.SAMPLE_ID=sample.INTERNAL_ID and mutation.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID=genetic_profile.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID and genetic_profile.STABLE_ID=#{geneticProfileStableId} and mutation_event.REFERENCE_ALLELE in ('A','T','C','G') and mutation_event.TUMOR_SEQ_ALLELE in ('A','T','C','G')
and sample.STABLE_ID in
#{item}
group by sample.STABLE_ID,mutation_event.REFERENCE_ALLELE,mutation_event.TUMOR_SEQ_ALLELE
